about.description:
`pip2conda` is a tool to translate `pip`-style requirements into `conda`
requirements.

`pip2conda2` uses [`build`](https://github.com/pypa/build) to generate
the metadata for a project, and then parses out the build and
runtime requirements for the project - including unpackging extras and
evaluating environment markers - before matching translating each requirement
into a conda-forge requirement suitable for installation with `conda/mamba`.
about.summary: Translate pip requirements into conda requirements

about.description:
`pip2conda` is a tool to translate `pip`-style requirements into `conda`
requirements.

`pip2conda2` uses [`build`](https://github.com/pypa/build) to generate
the metadata for a project, and then parses out the build and
runtime requirements for the project - including unpackging extras and
evaluating environment markers - before matching translating each requirement
into a conda-forge requirement suitable for installation with `conda/mamba`.
about.summary: Translate pip requirements into conda requirements

name: pip2conda
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "pip2conda" %}
{% set version = "0.8.1" %}

{% set python_min = "3.10" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 12fc53a26950a712d783ac28123955fa505fd684653d530c7b98b5941cc43cc6

build:
  entry_points:
    - pip2conda = pip2conda.pip2conda:main
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv

requirements:
  host:
    - pip
    - python {{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=61.0
    - setuptools-scm >=3.4.3
  run:
    - grayskull >=1.0.0
    - packaging >=25.0
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - python-build >=1.0.0
    - requests >=2.32.5
    - ruamel.yaml >=0.18.15
    - wheel >=0.45.1

test:
  requires:
    - pip
    - pytest >=8.4.1
    - python {{ python_min }}
  commands:
    # check metadata
    - python -m pip check
    - python -m pip show pip2conda
    # run test suite
    - python -m pytest -ra -v --pyargs pip2conda.tests -k "not real"
    # test entry point
    - pip2conda --help

about:
  home: https://gitlab.com/gwpy/pip2conda/
  dev_url: https://gitlab.com/gwpy/pip2conda.git
  doc_url: https://pip2conda.readthedocs.io/
  summary: Translate pip requirements into conda requirements
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  description: |
    `pip2conda` is a tool to translate `pip`-style requirements into `conda`
    requirements.

    `pip2conda2` uses [`build`](https://github.com/pypa/build) to generate
    the metadata for a project, and then parses out the build and
    runtime requirements for the project - including unpackging extras and
    evaluating environment markers - before matching translating each requirement
    into a conda-forge requirement suitable for installation with `conda/mamba`.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
